lead_paragraph: SunEdison, whose acquisition strategy has saddled it with almost $12 billion of debt, is at “substantial risk” of bankruptcy, one of its units warned.

headline.print_headline: SunEdison at ‘Substantial Risk’ of Bankruptcy, a Unit Warns

snippet: SunEdison, whose acquisition strategy has saddled it with almost $12 billion of debt, is at “substantial risk” of bankruptcy, one of its units warned.
abstract: Solar energy firm SunEdison is at 'substantial risk' of bankruptcy, with almost $12 billion of debt.
